name: Buildman (The Watching Bug)
description:
This was a game made for the Retrograde Jam 3. It is a simple Gameboy-style sandbox game where you can chop wood, use tools, and build!

~~ CONTROLS ~~

Arrows to move

Z to place item (while stationary) or craft with item

X to use tool

Shift to switch tools and buy items in the shop

Enter to play and enter/exit the shop

~~ TOOLS ~~

Use the Axe to chop down trees

Use the Hammer to destroy unwanted walls or floors

Use the shovel to uproot tree stumps

Use the tree to place down a new tree (costs 100 points)

~~ CREDIT ~~

Music by King Aurorus

Tools & Tree/Tree stump design by Dustimancer

Everything not listed: The Watching Bug

 Disclaimer: Due to limitations of the free version of Construct3 there are certain aspects of the game that are unpolished (basically, the trees jump around at the beginning of the game)
